pageContent.title: Moving Forward
pageContent.descriptionText: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:16pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px; padding:0 0 0 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Moving Forward</Introtext><welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:12pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:normal; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">The meeting with Dr. Cardonza went well, and the three of you agreed about the importance of geting Pharmacy on board with using Samsca in cardiology. You have since met with Michelle Hinley in Pharmacy, and with Dr. Gomez’s and Dr. Cardonza’s support, you have convinced Michelle that Samsca is an effective treatment for hyponatremia in appropriate patient types. Now that you have addressed everyone’s concerns about the patient cost and the hassles of prescribing Samsca, Pharmacy has agreed to remove the formulary restriction as it pertains to cardiology, which will allow for use by the cardiologists. </welcomeText>
